voldemort.store.stats
Class SimpleCounter

java.lang.Object
  voldemort.store.stats.SimpleCounter

public class SimpleCounter
extends java.lang.Object

A simple concurrent, non-blocking event counter that resets itself every interval, and provides eventRate and average event value metrics over the last interval
